title: Want to upgrade my t206 Christy Mathewson White Cap
author: wazoo

posts.post_title: Want to upgrade my t206 Christy Mathewson White Cap
posts.post_content:
Hey all, 
    I have a t206 Christy Mathewson white cap card in SGC 30 condition. The card is beautiful but I would like to upgrade it to a 40. I don't have scans of the photo as I am currently away from home. Please let me know if any of you are interested.
